name: im a drill
description:
This is a game about a drill. Spin that little drill till your heart is content.... Or you're out of gas. Use A and D to guide your drill and try to hit gold veins. You might go for those *very* dark blocks- they contain gas for your drill, but be wary! They'll gum up the inside workings of the drill, and will slow you down to a crawl. Look out for air pockets- they will speed you up, but you can't control your drill!

.

.

.

I went over on my time. I used all 3 hours of the Trijam + 2 hours and 35 minutes, brining the total time spent on this game 5 hours and 35 minutes. 

Had a lot of plans for this game, but 3 hours was very tight for me. This game was made in Godot 3.4.2 and assets created in GIMP 2.10.6
